scene_metadata.title: The Forgotten Pause
scene_metadata.philosophical_depth: the significance of pauses in revelation

dialogue.text: I forgot to mention one statement he made after the "you're change incarnate" part. He paused for a moment.

visual_elements.evan_appearance: slightly sheepish, realizing the importance of what he omitted
visual_elements.body_language: leaning forward, hands gesturing to emphasize

psychological_notes: The forgotten detail often carries the most weight. That Evan remembers the pause itself suggests its significance - the space between revelations can be as important as the revelations themselves.
philosophical_underpinning: Truth lives in the pauses between words; silence speaks volumes
therapeutic_direction: Honoring what was initially too powerful to share immediately
